overview: What goes on behind the doors of a swanky beauty salon? You'll find everyone's Coming In Style as this horny tale of carnal comb-outs unravels. Sidney the hairdresser works on stiffs in a funeral parlor until his friend, David, gets him to move uptown so Sidney can use his talents on David's escort girls.
tagline: Get Streaked, Stroked, Teased and Poked!
title: Coming in Style
